userStories.title: Create users table with auth fields
userStories.technical_notes: Create users table with id, email, password_hash, created_at, updated_at. Use bcrypt for password hashing.
acceptance_criteria: Users table created with proper schema
userStories.existing_implementation: No users table exists. This is NEW.

userStories.title: Implement registration endpoint
userStories.technical_notes: POST /api/register - validate email format, check for existing user, hash password, create user, return JWT.

userStories.title: Implement login endpoint
userStories.technical_notes: POST /api/login - validate credentials, return JWT on success.

userStories.title: Add auth middleware for protected routes
userStories.technical_notes: Create middleware that validates JWT from Authorization header and attaches user to request context.
acceptance_criteria: Attaches user object to request context
